content:
The Russian military attacked Nikopol in Dnipropetrovsk again, as a result of the shelling a woman was injured.

About thisReportsSES of Ukraine.

The munition of ammunition arose in the territory of one of the private households.

The fire damaged a residential building and an outbuilding on an area of 90 square meters. Firefighters extinguished the fire.

Enemy shelling wounded a woman born in 1946.

As ArmyInform reported, in the Kherson region as a result of russian shellingaffectedThree people.
title: The invaders attacked Nikopol again, wounded a woman
description: About it reports the SES of Ukraine. As a result of a munition, a fire occurred on ...
author: Army Inform
